embed.title: Spider Queen Tips
embed.description: Tips on Spider Queen Honor Hunting formation.

fields.name: Best Troops
fields.value:
• Pilgrims: 2 level-9 or 3 level-8
• Brawlers: 3 level-9 or 4 level-8
• Pumpkin Guard: 1 or 2
• Voodoo Dolls: a lot of level-9
• Taurus Witchers: a lot of level-9 or level-8
• Necromancer: a lot of level-9 or level-8
• Nun: a few

fields.name: Filler Troops
fields.value:
• Voodoo Dolls: level-8
• Taurus Witcher: level-9
• Ghost Assassins: level-9
• Undead Soldier: level-9
• Other 9-load troops, preferably level-9

fields.name: Tips
fields.value: • Use the Re-Target button when the Spider Queen is about to use her third skill

fields.name: Stages
fields.value:
• Stage 1: day 1-3
• Stage 2: day 4-5
• Stage 3: day 6-7
